ResearchProjectDef.label: 35mm Autocannon Turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build a 35mm Autocannon Turret. This turret needs to be manned and uses 35mmx3 Autocannon Shells for ammo. It deals bonus armor piercing damage for a direct hit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 30mm Avenger Fire Turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build the 30mm Avenger Fire Turret. This turret needs to be manned and uses 30mmx8 Avenger Shells for ammo. It deals extra armor piercing damage for a direct hit.
